EmailTemplate.name: TSS_UserConference_SurveyReminder
EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON Survey Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don't Forget 2011 TriCON Survey Reminder
We strongly value your feedback. In fact, we RELY on your feedback in developing our program and agenda for TriCON. Please help us continue to make TriCON a valuable investment for your agency and an enjoyable experience for you.
To complete our TriCON 2011 Attendee Survey Visit: http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/TriCON2011
All of us at TriTech Software Systems thank you for your continued participation in this important event, and we look forward to seeing you next year at TriCON 2012 in San Diego.
Regards, Jenny V. Clavero Associate Marketing Manager TriTech Software Systems | www.tritech.com
Direct: 858.799.7362 | jenny.clavero@tritech.com
Save the Date and Budget for TriCON 2012 Dates: Wednesday, September 26 - Friday, September 28 Location: Hilton San Diego Bayfront Discounted hotel rate: $199/night
Support: Contact Jenny or Accounting to add TriCON registration to your support agreement.
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
